DOC.brief_summary: This study two-period , double-blind study healthy adult female subject . Each subject participate oral contraceptive Run-in period prior treatment period . The length Run-in Period 28 day longer , depend time subject 's menstrual cycle whether subject take OC . Each subject participate run-in period ( need ) , follow two treatment period . Treatment Periods 1 2 must conduct successively . Subjects randomize cross-over fashion either YASMIN GSK2248761 Placebo 10 day switch GSK2248761 placebo another 10 day . Subjects return study center final follow evaluation 7 - 14 day final dose study medication .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Oral Contraceptive When Co-administered With GSK2248761 Healthy Adult Female Subjects .

Female , 18 40 year age inclusive , time signing informed consent .
